songs.title: Spittin’ Game (Interlude)
songs.lyrics:
Man check this out man
Little C-Mo came with uh
Chuuuuuch
And then you had uh King Boo
R.I.P came with Tabernacle nigga
Well guess what
Pimp C came with sanctuary bitch
Ya’ll can chop that up how you want to
Bitch get your ass out there and get it
If you dancing in the club hoe
And you sliding on the pole you just a Holdefer
Yeah bitch you just need to get out their on the track
And get it get it get it
Instead on not being whipped yeah
Funk ass bitch yeah
If you sliding on a pole for dollar bills
You need to go and hit the track and get real bitch
